"For the past 10 years, Eric Schmidt has grown Google into an extraordinarily successful company. Our core business is growing and our emerging businesses are on fire," a Google spokesman said. Google's board has made compensation a key issue this year. Eric Schmidt has not been granted any stock since he became chief executive and chairman in 2001, the spokesman added. 04 Dec 2010 On Friday, Mr Eric Schmidt , 55, said he was preparing to sell$ 326m-worth of shares in the search engine. While Page and Sergey Brin founded the company, Eric Schmidt was brought in ten years ago to help manage the business side of Google. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed, Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter feed after the announcement.
